column1: #Text=Teo says : " Wow , I do n't think I can do that .
#Text=" Teo says : " Hey , you 're a real airbender .
#Text=" Teo says : " You think this is good , wait until you see the other stuff my dad designed .
#Text=" Teo says : " Yeah , my dad is the mastermind behind this whole place .
#Text=It even pumps hot air currents outside to give us a lift while we 're gliding .
#Text=" Aang says : " This place is unbelievable .
#Text=" Teo says : " Yeah , it 's great , is n't it ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang used to come here a long time ago .
#Text=I think he 's a little shocked it 's so ... different .
#Text=" Aang says : " This is supposed to be the history of my people .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm sure some parts of the temple are still the same .
#Text=" Aang says : " It 's nice to see that at least one part of the temple that is n't ruined .
#Text=Do n't you know enough to stay away from construction sites ?
#Text=We have to make room for the bathhouse !
#Text=" Aang says : " Do you know what you did !?
#Text=" Mechanist says : " Well , people around here are starting to stink .
#Text=" Aang says : " This whole place stinks !
